categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Vorgath was a Human male colonel in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire who was influenced by the Dread Masters into joining the Dread Host on Denova. He was slain in battle in 3639 BBY.
Vorgath appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a boss in the "Explosive Conflict" operation.
